variable-sql.name: SQL_Multiple_AccountID_user500
variable-sql.query: SELECT TOP 5000 pv.PatientVisitAccount , pv.PatientVisitID , org.OrgLevel1ID , org.OrgLevel1Name FROM tblPatientVisits (NOLOCK) pv INNER JOIN tblOrganizationLevel1 (NOLOCK) org ON org.OrgLevel1ID = pv.OrganizationID INNER JOIN dbo.tblWorkListQueues AS twlq ON pv.PatientVisitID = twlq.PatientVisitID INNER JOIN dbo.tblQueues AS tq ON twlq.SecurityObjectID = tq.SecurityObjectID WHERE tq.BalanceType = 1 -- CurrentAccountBalance; for details see vw_WorklistSummation for other balance types ORDER BY NEWID();
